| **Environment** | **Printed Name** | **Label Prefix** |
|-----------------|------------------|------------------|

| lemma           | Lemma            | lem              |
| corollary       | Corollary        | cor              |
| proposition     | Proposition      | prp              |

| definition      | Definition       | def              |

| exercise        | Exercise         | exr              |
